name: NeonKnight
description:
A 2D action platformer where the last of an order of cybernetic knights journeys through a castle-like factory that is manufacturing hordes of evil robots.

Controls

Xbox360

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A

Melee/Retrieve Weapon: X

Throw Weapon/Grapple: Right Bumper

Aim Weapon: Right Stick

Keyboard

Move: W, A, S, D

Jump: Spacebar

Melee/Retrieve Weapon: Left Click

Throw Weapon/Grapple: Right Click

Aim Weapon: Hold Right Click
